item.description:
"Proven Strategies for Today's Market! "


Donna Bauer, nationally known as The NoteBuyerâ„¢, is the most recognized authority on Discounted Notes, Seller Financing, and Pre-foreclosures. For the past two decades, Donna's exclusive strategies have produced stunning results regardless of economic conditions.

As thousands of successful investors have discovered, Donna's approach to real estate investing is brilliantly suited to today's market and the shift toward alternative forms of financing. Opportunity abounds for those who recognize the silver lining of market downturns.

Now more than ever, it's time to put the explosive potential of note buying to work for you!

Monthly Meeting

5:30 - 6:30 PM - Networking and Meet the Vendors
5:30 - Power Hour - Members only
6:00 - Orientation - Members and Visitors - get more out of your visit and your membership
6:30 PM - Meeting

Location: Best Western Hotel, 380 Winter St, Waltham, Ma
NOTE LOCATION CHANGE!
Free to BostonAREIA members, Visitors only $25 at the door. visit - http://www.BostonAREI...
